name: In-Vu
description:
Will you help Inny and Vule escape the dungeons and break the curse?

In this game made for Weekly Game Jam 157 - "Vulnerable Invincible", you will control Vule the vulnerable and Inny the invincible. A witch has cursed them by blending them together, and sending them into dungeons full of monsters.

CONTROLS (They're also in-game)

-WASD/ Arrows to move as Vule

-R to reset the level, in case you're stuck or the exit is unreachable.

-SPACE to change between Inny and Vule.

-MOUSE AND CLICK to aim and shoot as Inny

The game was made in 6 days by TheInkSkeleton. Using the Unity2D Game Engine, Bosca Ceoil for the music, and Paint.net for the images.
